results.content: The content is precise and short. Does not waste time on unnecessary stuff.
results.content_html: The content is precise and short. Does not waste time on unnecessary stuff.

results.content: The course boils down to the author narrating the code he writes. There's very little talk about the supposed topic of the course (Socket.IO) and a lot of outdated HTML wrangling through jQuery. At least the course is short ;)
results.content_html: The course boils down to the author narrating the code he writes. There's very little talk about the supposed topic of the course (Socket.IO) and a lot of outdated HTML wrangling through jQuery. At least the course is short ;)

results.content: I wanted a quick introduction to socket.io with examples, and this course helped, thanks!
results.content_html: I wanted a quick introduction to socket.io with examples, and this course helped, thanks!

results.content:
It is a good course to do! You are going to learn how to construct a Chat app using socket.io and node.js

Good work Kovacevic!

(pd: Personally, I think it should have been good to add 2 or 3 videos (which is not a lot) to improve the css and the presentation view of the chat app)
